title: Drawing
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, red ink
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
inscribed:
Numbered in pen and brown ink at upper right:135
Indication of scale in pen and brown ink, at right and bottom, the height up to the entablature of the tent is indicated: 16 1/2; that of entablature: 5/12
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing.
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, red ink. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1653.
